title: ConvertUTF8toUTF16 (Function)
text:
FUNCTION ConvertUTF8toUTF16 : UDINT
This function converts an UTF-8 encoded string to an UTF-16 encoded string (may be wrong for 3 or 4 character encoded UTF16 characters).

rows.Name: sourceStart
rows.Comment: Pointer to the UTF-8 string to convert

rows: Pointer to the WSTRING the result shall be stored in

The size (in bytes) of the buffer (targetStart) the result
shall be stored in
Do not continue on illegal characters
